enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Only students in the MSJ program may enroll in these classes
title: JOUR JOUR 425-2-20 Advanced Health and Sciences Reporting

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: An advanced weekly seminar in the health and sciences reporting fields with in-depth reporting assignments. Class builds on science writing and reporting skills learned in the first quarter of the sequence by teaching students to master deep information discovery, reporting and graphic skills in a particular area of science or health. Students build from small pieces up to a final narrative story of publishable quality that would be suitable for a general interest magazine such as the New York Times Magazine or The New Yorker.

subject: JOUR
